title: For the reservation of parking lot on a land included in CDS, 125% BUA as per Zonal (basic) FSI for the area under reservation in that plot shall be made available free of cost to the MCGM or to any other Appropriate Authority
clause_text: For the reservation of parking lot on a land included in CDS, 125% BUA as per Zonal (basic) FSI for the area under reservation in that plot shall be made available free of cost to the MCGM or to any other Appropriate Authority. Such BUA to be handed over shall be free of FSI.
section: (I) Development of reservation in Reconstruction or redevelopment of Cluster(s) of Buildings under Cluster Development Scheme(s)under Regulation No. 33(9):
